home.legend: Trouvez les magasins locaux qui livrent chez vous!
home.legend_placeholder: Projet mondial 'open-source' pour sauver les magasins locaux!

placeholder.postal: Entrez votre code postal --- sans espace

result_success.description3: Veuillez informer autant de propriétaires de magasins et d'acheteurs de ce service afin que plus de magasins puissent survivre!

home.result_fail: *Aucun magasin ne s'est encore inscrit pour livrer dans votre région! Aidez-nous à passer le mot et à mettre en ligne les magasins et les acheteurs locaux dès que possible! Partager Partager Partager!

label.postal: Which postal codes can you deliver to?

placeholder.postal: Add up to 10 postal codes where you can deliver - do no add spacing in your postal codes - sperate different postal codes with a comma ','

about.heading: SHOPILOC IS A OPEN-SOURCE PROJECT WITH THE SIMPLE GOAL OF SHOPPERS FINDING LOCAL INDEPENDENT STORES THAT CAN DELIVER TO THEIR HOUSE IN THESE TIMES OF CRISIS.

section1.heading: How you can help
section1.item3: Get storeowners to add their stores
section1.item4: If you are a marketer - copywriter - developer - designer or have any skill that can help save local businesses, let us know - we have a trello-board here where you can comment suggestions
section1.item5: Donations are welcome - we don't need much - just enough to run the server - any extra donations will be used on adspend!

question.question1: Why should't I shop on Amazon
question.answer1: Amazon is great, but small independent shops in your area suddenly stopped getting traffic. This means unless we do an extra effort they will shut down.Your 'main' street will be filled with bankrupt shops.
question.question2: What's the difference between this and Google?
question.answer2: The shops you see are limited to the ones that can actually deliver personally in your area. Each shop on the list can only add a limited amount of postal codes as their delivery zone - this means you are really getting your local shops instead of the big e-com players that dominate Google
question.question3: I own a shop - but don't have a site, HELP!
question.answer3: We got you - click here - to have a step by step video tutorial on how to set up a Shopify store at the lowest price possible.
question.question4: Why is your 'set up a store' tutorial just for Shopify?
question.answer4: We don't think this is the time to debate which platform is better. We made the videos for Shopify because that's what we are fluent in - we are more then open to add tutorials on other platforms as well! The goal is to get as many independent shop owners online asap
question.question5: I added my store but I don't see it!
question.answer5: We manually accept new store entries - this might take a moment - we do this to limit the amount of span and because we kept the product basic
question.question6: Why isn't my country featured in the search list?
question.answer6: This means we don't have any stores in your country yet - and that's sad news :( - You need to help us get the word out!
question.question7: When I add my store - I can't add more then 6 postal codes as delivery zones
question.answer7: Yes we know - reason is that we want to keep it local. Amazon delivers everywhere, so does zara.com. This site is to give a lifeline to your local corner-store that never did any web marketing before and that stands no chance in ranking on google. That's why delivery-zones are limited.
question.question8: I made a mistake in my store listing - how do I change it?
question.answer8: Ow lord - we're not fancy enough yet! You need to send us an email andrew@ecomexperts.io
question.answer9: We are in talks with multiple government organizations of different countries (3) and e-commerce platforms(2) but govs & multinationals take time so no official affiliation yet! :(
question.question10: Is this the latest version of an item
question.answer10: Each item in PrepBootstrap is maintained to its latest version. This ensures its smooth operation.
